waste_details.reason_for_no_provision: No waste created - it is a memorial sculpture

description: Installation of the `People of London' Memorial in a new location in the South Churchyard of St Paul's Cathedral, relocation of the City of London Corporation Plaque to the entrance path to the east, and associated works.
